event: Adam saves Jonas from the apocalypse.
They must use it to break the cycle. Martha and Jonas  must travel to the origin world.

During the Apocalypse, time stands still for a fraction of a second, breaking the chain of cause and effect. For a moment, there is a gap through which reality can proceed in two different directions: a switch at the knot of the time loop.
Old Claudia realized that they're not all part of the knot. They must remove the knot to destroy all that was born on it and keeping everything alive that already existed in the origin world.
Adam and old Claudia arrive to sic mundus' headquarters.
Martha meets Adam and tells him that she has fulfilled the mission.
Agnes joins sic mundus again.
Adam gives her the newspaper that shows old claudia's death.
Agnes leaves through the God Particle.
Adam explains adult Charlotte that in just one day they are going to unravel the knot. He wants to save his world, not Eve's.
Adult charlotte and adult Elisabeth leave through the God Particle to 2041.
Martha reminds Adam that she has kept her end of the bargain. Now she wants to know what is the origin and how to destroy it.
Adam reveals to teen Martha that the female stranger didn't send teen Jonas and her to stop the apocalypse. Instead they created the seed: the beginning of the knot, and also its end.
Adam encloses Martha.
Adam wants to create a "paradise". Unending darkness in which nothing exists.
Silja frees Martha and takes her with Adam.
Adult Franziska and adult Magnus travel to find Martha.
Teen Silja travel to 1890 to meet Bartosz.
Adam ties Martha up in the former cooling bash. he wants to destroy her and her unborn child, putting an end to both worlds.
Adam takes the St. Christopher medallion ...
... and activates the machine.
Martha dies ...
... but nothing happens.

Old Claudia arrives and explains to Adam that his attempt has failed due to quantum entanglement. Eve found a way to change the course of events, meaning there is a second pregnant Martha out there that will give birth and preserve the knot.
Old claudia reveals that the origin doesn't lies in the connection between both worlds but in reality it lies outside both of those worlds.
There is a third world: the origin world.
Tannhaus, in the origin world, lost someone and he tried to bring them back from the death, but instead, he split and destroyed his world, thus creating both adam and eve worlds.
There is a way to destroy the knot by preventing the invention of travel through space and time in the origin world.
Old Claudia has discovered quantum entanglement and the origin world.
Old Claudia explains adult Jonas his next steps. he have to set the course, no matter how hard it may seem.
Old Claudia tears the last pages.
Jonas learns from Claudia in the bunker/base of operations.

The date it's prophesied that the passage will open and everyone will be led into paradise by sic mundus.

She explains the meaning of the three cycles: - teen Jonas opened the passage in 202- adult Jonas had previously shut in 2019- the passage was opened in summer 1986 for the first timein all three moments they left behind traces of cesium residue. In every cycle at each of these three moments the cesium is carried throught the tunnel and back before it's completely decayed. It exponentially expands endlessly, so it creates the passage.
Everything has to happen again. They must keep the loop.
Adult claudia (Martha's world) gives adult Claudia (Jonas' world) the notebook and explains that she need lead everybody along the same path. She need the mantain the knot.

Old claudia (Jonas' world) remembers what her older version said:  "If all of this works, our Regina will live." Then, why does she need to suffer endlessly?
